embeds.title: Thanks for inviting MC Linker!
embeds.description:
To get started, please connect your Minecraft server to the bot:

• Install the **Discord-Linker** plugin from [SpigotMC](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/discord-linker.98749/), [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/plugin/discord-linker) or from the [Aternos Plugin List](https://aternos.org/addons/a/spigot/98749) to your Minecraft server.
• Execute </connect plugin:932257443394777129> in Discord.
• Execute the command from the embed in Minecraft.

**That's it!**
You can now create a chat-bridge using </chatchannel add:932257443394777128> or check out any of the other commands!

If you need more help, join the [Support Server](https://discord.gg/rX36kZUGNK) or visit the [MC Linker Guide](https://guide.mclinker.com).

embeds.description: Account verification timed out. Please try again.

embeds.title: Account Verification
embeds.description:
%emoji_step% To verify your account, please join the server (**%ip%**) and execute the following command: ```/verify %code%```
**You have 3 minutes to run the command.**

embeds.title: Select Message Types
embeds.description: %emoji_step% Select all message types you want the bot to send. (You have 3 minutes to select)

options.label: Chat Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a player chats.

options.label: Join Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a player joins the server.

options.label: Quit Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a player leaves the server.

options.label: Advancement Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a player completes an advancement.

options.label: Death Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a player dies.

options.label: Player Command Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a command is sent by a player.

options.label: Console Command Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a command is sent by the console.

options.label: Block Command Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever a command block is executed.

options.label: Startup Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever the server starts up.

options.label: Shutdown Messages
options.description: Send a message whenever the server shuts down.

embeds.title: Server Verification
embeds.description:
%emoji_step% Install the [Discord-Linker](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/discord-linker.98749/) plugin on your server.
Then join your server as an operator and execute the following command: ```/linker connect %code%```
**You have 3 minutes to run the command.**

embeds.title: Server Verification
embeds.description:
%emoji_step% Please check the console of your Minecraft server and enter the verification code from the server console below this message.
**You have 3 minutes to reply.**

stats.name: stats
stats.long_description:
Look at your and other member's Minecraft server stats.
All Categories (ids) can be found [here](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names)!
All stats of the `custom` category can be found [here](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names).
stats.description: Look at your and other member's Minecraft server stats.

account.name: account
account.long_description: Connect or disconnect your Minecraft Java-Edition account with/from the bot. Connecting allows you to mention yourself in command arguments.

options.description: Connect your Minecraft-account.

options.name: username

options.name: disconnect
options.description: Disconnect your account.

statchannel.name: statchannel
statchannel.long_description: Manage statchannels in the server that will show the current player count of the Minecraft server or it's online status.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a statchannel to the server.

options.name: status
options.description: Add a statchannel that will show the online status of the Minecraft server.

options.name: channel
options.description: Set the channel you want to add as a statchannel.

options.name: online
options.description: Set the message that will be shown when the server is online.

options.name: offline
options.description: Set the message that will be shown when the server is offline.

options.name: member-counter
options.description: Add a statchannel that will show the current player count of the Minecraft server.

options.name: channel
options.description: Set the channel you want to add as a statchannel.

options.name: message
options.description: Set the message that will be shown for the player count. Use %count% for the player count.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a statchannel from the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: Set the channel you want to remove.

options.name: list
options.description: List all statchannels in the server.

options.name: filter
options.description: Set a filter to only show statchannels of a specific type.

chatchannel.name: chatchannel
chatchannel.long_description: Manage channels in which the bot will send Minecraft chat messages and logs.
chatchannel.description: Manage channels in which the bot will send Minecraft chat messages and logs.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a chatchannel.

options.name: channel
options.description: Set the channel.

options.name: discord-to-minecraft
options.description: Enable chat messages from Discord to Minecraft. (Default: true)

options.name: webhooks
options.description: Enable webhook mode for chat messages. (Default: true)

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove an existing chatchannel.

options.name: channel
options.description: Set the channel.

options.name: list
options.description: List all chatchannels.

connect.name: connect
connect.long_description:
Connect your Minecraft Java-Edition server with the bot. Connection methods are:
-ftp (also includes sftp/ftps)
-plugin
**You can download the plugin using [this link](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/discord-linker.98749/).**
connect.description: Connect your Minecraft server with the bot.

options.name: ftp
options.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp/ftps.

options.name: host
options.description: Set the ftp-host.

options.name: username
options.description: Set the ftp-username. (`none` if no username)

options.name: password
options.description: Set the ftp-password (`none` if no password).

options.name: port
options.description: Set the ftp-port.

options.name: version
options.description: Set the Minecraft version.

options.name: path
options.description: Set the server-path (Format: /path/to/server).

options.name: plugin
options.description: Connect your Minecraft server using the Discord-Linker plugin.

options.name: join-requirement
options.description: Set which requirements a user needs to join the server.

options.name: display-ip
options.description: Set the public IP address that will be displayed in some of the bot's commands.

options.name: online
options.description: Manually set the configured online-mode of the server. For BungeeCord servers, set this to "True"

options.name: backup
options.description: Connect your Minecraft server using the Discord-Linker plugin with backup-mode enabled.

options.name: ip
options.description: Set the ip of your Minecraft server.

options.name: port
options.description: Set the port of the plugin (Default: 11111).

options.name: join-requirement
options.description: Set which requirements a user needs to join the server.

disable.name: disable
disable.long_description:
Disable a specific command/stat/advancement. List disabled commands/stats/advancements with `/disable list`.
Disabled Chat Commands will not be sent in any configured chatchannel.

options.name: chat-commands
options.description: Disable a command preventing it from being sent in any chatchannel.

options.name: command
options.description: Set the command you want to disable

options.name: list
options.description: Get a list of all disabled commands/stats/advancements

options.name: category
options.description: Set the category which you want to list

disconnect.name: disconnect
disconnect.long_description: Disconnect your Minecraft Java-Edition server from the bot and delete all saved credentials. To connect again, use `/connect`.
disconnect.description: Disconnect your Minecraft server from the bot.

enable.name: enable
enable.long_description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (They're all enabled by default).
enable.description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (All enabled by default)

options.name: stats
options.description: Enable a disabled stat

options.name: stat
options.description: Set the stat you want to enable

options.name: advancements
options.description: Enable a disabled advancement

options.name: advancement
options.description: Set the advancement you want to enable

options.name: chat-commands
options.description: Enable a disabled chat-command allowing it to be sent again.

options.name: command
options.description: Set the command you want to enable

rolesync.name: rolesync
rolesync.long_description: Manage roles that will sync their members to a Minecraft team or luckperms group.
rolesync.description: Manage roles that will sync their members to a Minecraft team or luckperms group.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a synced role.

options.name: role
options.description: Set the role you want to sync.

options.name: group_or_team
options.description: Set the Minecraft team or Luckperms group you want to sync to.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove an existing synced role.

options.name: role
options.description: Set the role you want to remove.

options.name: list
options.description: List all synced roles.

connectedaccount.name: Has Minecraft Account
connectedaccount.description: Whether the user has connected their Minecraft account.
